# AXDataAxisDescriptor

**Protocol**

The basic interface for a data axis in a chart.

## Declaration

```swift
protocol AXDataAxisDescriptor : NSCopying
```

## Overview

Each [doc://com.apple.Accessibility/documentation/Accessibility/AXChart] requires at least two [doc://com.apple.Accessibility/documentation/Accessibility/AXDataAxisDescriptor] objects to describe an x-axis and a y-axis.

## Specifying the title

- **title**: The title of the axis.
- **attributedTitle**: An attributed version of the axis title.

## Axis representation

- **AXCategoricalDataAxisDescriptor**: An object that represents an axis of categorical data.
- **AXNumericDataAxisDescriptor**: An object that represents an axis of numerical data.

## Inherits From

- NSCopying

## Conforming Types

- AXCategoricalDataAxisDescriptor
- AXNumericDataAxisDescriptor

items.description: An attributed version of the axis title.
items.name: attributedTitle

items.name: AXCategoricalDataAxisDescriptor

items.description: An object that represents an axis of numerical data.
items.name: AXNumericDataAxisDescriptor
